title: Font ID for this Sans Serif
content:
Any clue for this font? Also seen in the new version of computer arts

[http://mos.futurenet.com/resources/computerarts/Computer\_Arts.swf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107223416/http:/mos.futurenet.com/resources/computerarts/Computer_Arts.swf "http://mos.futurenet.com/resources/computerarts/Computer\_Arts.swf")

author: pablink

comments.content:
the "l" and the "g"...  
I'm pretty sure it's akkurat.
I'm sure you're right. I'm not very familiar with Akkurat.

Patricia, that's a very inspiring range of work in your portfolio. Very nice.  
/Fredrik
Yes it is akkurat Great Font love the g
